Can array based initialization of mersenne twister which is used in current 
libraries be reversed to get the seed (any 1-19937 bit quantity)

<!--more-->

I hope its the time to dive into the mersenne twister implementation of python
to get a hang of `init_by_array` seed initialization. I give you the first
32 bit outputs from the random number, you go tell me what the seed was i.e 
your flag.  


```python
from secret import flag
import random

seed = int.from_bytes(flag,'big')
random.seed(seed)

outputs = [random.getrandbits(32) for i in range(624)]
print(outputs)
```
